column12: OPTICAL SENSING SYSTEM WITH A PHASE SENSITIVE AMPLIFIER AND ASSOCIATED METHODS
column13: An optical sensing system includes a transmitter configured to transmit a free-space optical signal toward a target, and a receiver configured to receive a reflected free-space optical target signal from the target. The receiver includes a phase sensitive amplifier (PSA), a homodyne detector coupled downstream from the PSA, and a controller configured to adjust a phase of the PSA based upon the homodyne detector.
column14: SMITH KEVIN H;;VISONE CHRISTOPHER P;;GLASSER RYAN T;;SILVER MICHAEL L;;BURBERRY LEE M;;WASILOUSKY PETER A;;HARRIS CORP STATE DELAWARE
